elbit-systems.name: Bezhalel Machlis
elbit-systems.bio: Has served as President and CEO of Elbit Systems since 2013, overseeing the company's growth into Israel's largest publicly traded defense firm.

elbit-systems.name: Michael Federmann
elbit-systems.bio: Long-serving Chairman of Elbit Systems and patriarch of the Federmann family, which has been the company's controlling shareholder for decades.

elbit-systems.name: Ran Porat
elbit-systems.bio: Senior executive at Elbit Systems who has led multiple business divisions including the company's C4I and cyber operations.

elbit-systems.name: Dalia Rabin
elbit-systems.bio: Daughter of Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin who has served on Elbit Systems' board of directors and held various public service roles.

israel-electric-corporation.name: Meir Spiegler
israel-electric-corporation.bio: Appointed CEO of the Israel Electric Corporation, leading the state-owned utility through major reform and infrastructure modernization.

israel-electric-corporation.name: Yiftah Ron-Tal
israel-electric-corporation.bio: Former IDF general who served as Chairman of the Israel Electric Corporation, guiding the company's transition toward renewable energy.

israel-electric-corporation.name: Ofer Bloch
israel-electric-corporation.bio: Served as CEO of the Israel Electric Corporation during a period of significant restructuring and regulatory changes in the Israeli energy market.

technion-israel-institute-of-technology.name: Uri Sivan
technion-israel-institute-of-technology.bio: Distinguished physicist who became President of the Technion in 2019, previously serving as founding director of the Russell Berrie Nanotechnology Institute.

technion-israel-institute-of-technology.name: Boaz Golany
technion-israel-institute-of-technology.bio: Industrial engineering professor serving as Executive VP for Research at the Technion, overseeing the university's extensive research enterprise.

technion-israel-institute-of-technology.name: Dan Shechtman
technion-israel-institute-of-technology.bio: Nobel Prize in Chemistry laureate (2011) for the discovery of quasicrystals, and longtime Technion faculty member in materials science and engineering.

technion-israel-institute-of-technology.name: Peretz Lavie
technion-israel-institute-of-technology.bio: Renowned sleep researcher who served as President of the Technion from 2009 to 2019, expanding the university's global partnerships and research output.

rafael-advanced-defense-systems.name: Yoav Har-Even
rafael-advanced-defense-systems.bio: Retired Major General who has led Rafael Advanced Defense Systems, overseeing development of the Iron Dome and other advanced weapons systems.

rafael-advanced-defense-systems.name: Uzi Rubin
rafael-advanced-defense-systems.role: Former Director of Israel Missile Defense Organization
rafael-advanced-defense-systems.bio: Pioneer of Israeli missile defense who directed the Arrow program and played a key role in shaping Rafael's strategic defense capabilities.

rafael-advanced-defense-systems.name: Moshe Patel
rafael-advanced-defense-systems.role: Head of Israel Missile Defense Organization
rafael-advanced-defense-systems.bio: Led the Israel Missile Defense Organization which partnered closely with Rafael on development of the Iron Dome and David's Sling systems.

rafael-advanced-defense-systems.name: Giora Katz
rafael-advanced-defense-systems.bio: Former EVP at Rafael who led the company's land and naval division, overseeing the development of major defense platforms.

sheba-medical-center.name: Yitshak Kreiss
sheba-medical-center.bio: Brigadier General (res.) and physician who has served as Director General of Sheba Medical Center, leading it to global recognition in medical innovation.

sheba-medical-center.name: Arnon Afek
sheba-medical-center.bio: Physician and health policy expert who has served in senior leadership at Sheba Medical Center and played a significant national role during COVID-19.

sheba-medical-center.name: Eyal Zimlichman
sheba-medical-center.role: Chief Medical Officer & Chief Innovation Officer
sheba-medical-center.bio: Drives Sheba's ARC innovation center and digital health transformation, positioning the hospital as a leading global health-tech hub.

jewish-agency-for-israel.name: Doron Almog
jewish-agency-for-israel.bio: Retired IDF Major General and founder of ADI Negev rehabilitation village who was elected Chairman of the Jewish Agency in 2022.

jewish-agency-for-israel.name: Amira Ahronoviz
jewish-agency-for-israel.bio: Long-serving executive who became CEO and Director General of the Jewish Agency, managing its worldwide operations for aliyah and Jewish engagement.

jewish-agency-for-israel.name: Natan Sharansky
jewish-agency-for-israel.bio: Soviet dissident and human rights icon who served as Chairman of the Jewish Agency from 2009 to 2018 after a career in Israeli politics.

jewish-agency-for-israel.name: Isaac Herzog
jewish-agency-for-israel.bio: Served as Chairman of the Jewish Agency from 2018 to 2021 before being elected the 11th President of the State of Israel.

israel-chemicals-icl.name: Raviv Zoller
israel-chemicals-icl.bio: Appointed President and CEO of ICL Group, leading the specialty minerals company's transformation and global expansion in agriculture and industrial solutions.

israel-chemicals-icl.name: Johanna Soderstrom
israel-chemicals-icl.bio: International business executive who serves as Chairperson of ICL's board, bringing extensive experience in global industrial operations.

israel-chemicals-icl.name: Aviram Lahav
israel-chemicals-icl.bio: Chief Financial Officer of ICL Group, responsible for the company's financial strategy and capital allocation across its global operations.

habima-theatre.name: Odelia Friedman
habima-theatre.bio: Serves as General Director of Habima, Israel's national theater, overseeing its programming and operations in Tel Aviv's cultural center.

habima-theatre.name: Ilan Ronen
habima-theatre.bio: Leading Israeli theater director who served as Artistic Director of Habima Theatre for many years, shaping its modern repertoire.

habima-theatre.name: Nahum Zemach
habima-theatre.bio: Founded Habima Theatre in Moscow in 1918 as the first professional Hebrew-language theater company, later relocating it to British Mandatory Palestine.

zim-integrated-shipping-services.name: Eli Glickman
zim-integrated-shipping-services.bio: Led ZIM Integrated Shipping Services through its successful IPO on the New York Stock Exchange in 2021 and a period of record profitability.

zim-integrated-shipping-services.name: Yair Seroussi
zim-integrated-shipping-services.bio: Former chairman of Bank Hapoalim who serves as Chairman of ZIM's board, overseeing the company's strategic direction as a global container shipping leader.

zim-integrated-shipping-services.name: Xavier Destriau
zim-integrated-shipping-services.bio: Chief Financial Officer of ZIM Integrated Shipping Services, managing the company's financial operations during its transition to a publicly traded company.

bezeq.name: Ran Guron
bezeq.bio: Appointed CEO of Bezeq, leading Israel's largest telecommunications provider through network modernization and fiber-optic expansion.

bezeq.name: Gil Sharon
bezeq.bio: Chairman of the board of Bezeq Israel Telecom, overseeing the company's governance during a period of major industry transformation.

bezeq.name: Shaul Elovitch
bezeq.bio: Businessman who was the controlling shareholder of Bezeq through Eurocom Group, later becoming a central figure in Israeli telecommunications regulatory controversies.

tel-aviv-university.name: Ariel Porat
tel-aviv-university.bio: Distinguished law professor who became President of Tel Aviv University in 2021, previously serving as dean of the Buchmann Faculty of Law.

tel-aviv-university.name: Milette Shamir
tel-aviv-university.bio: Professor of American literature serving as Rector of Tel Aviv University, overseeing the academic affairs of Israel's largest university.

tel-aviv-university.name: Joseph Klafter
tel-aviv-university.bio: Renowned physicist who served as President of Tel Aviv University from 2009 to 2019, expanding the university's international standing and research programs.

africa-israel-investments.name: Lev Leviev
africa-israel-investments.bio: Uzbek-born Israeli diamond magnate who founded Africa Israel Investments and built it into a major international conglomerate spanning real estate, construction, and diamonds.

africa-israel-investments.name: Avraham Novogrocki
africa-israel-investments.bio: Chief Executive Officer of Africa Israel Investments, managing the conglomerate's diverse portfolio of real estate, infrastructure, and investment operations.

ben-gurion-university-of-the-negev.name: Daniel Chamovitz
ben-gurion-university-of-the-negev.bio: Plant biologist and author who became President of Ben-Gurion University of the Negev in 2018.

ben-gurion-university-of-the-negev.name: Chaim Hames
ben-gurion-university-of-the-negev.bio: Professor of medieval history serving as Rector of Ben-Gurion University, overseeing academic programs across the university's campuses.

ben-gurion-university-of-the-negev.name: Rivka Carmi
ben-gurion-university-of-the-negev.bio: Pediatric geneticist who served as President of Ben-Gurion University from 2006 to 2018, the first woman to lead an Israeli research university.

azrieli-group.name: Danna Azrieli
azrieli-group.bio: Daughter of founder David Azrieli who serves as Chairperson of the Azrieli Group, one of Israel's largest real estate and shopping center companies.

azrieli-group.name: Eyal Henkin
azrieli-group.bio: Chief Executive Officer of the Azrieli Group, managing the company's extensive portfolio of shopping malls, office towers, and senior housing across Israel.

azrieli-group.name: David Azrieli
azrieli-group.bio: Canadian-Israeli architect and businessman who founded the Azrieli Group and built the iconic Azrieli Center towers in Tel Aviv before his death in 2014.

cellebrite.name: Yossi Carmil
cellebrite.bio: Leads Cellebrite as CEO, guiding the digital intelligence company through its public listing and expansion of its digital forensics platform.

cellebrite.name: Ron Serber
cellebrite.bio: Co-founded Cellebrite and served as Co-CEO, helping build the company into a global leader in mobile data extraction.

cellebrite.name: Avi Yablonka
cellebrite.bio: Co-founded Cellebrite in 1999, playing a key role in the company's early development of mobile communication and data transfer technologies.

cyberark.name: Udi Mokady
cyberark.bio: Co-founded CyberArk in 1999 and served as CEO for over two decades before transitioning to Executive Chairman.

cyberark.name: Matt Cohen
cyberark.bio: Appointed CEO of CyberArk in 2023, previously serving as COO and leading the company's go-to-market transformation and cloud security strategy.

cyberark.name: Alon Cohen
cyberark.bio: Co-founded CyberArk alongside Udi Mokady and served as CTO, developing the foundational privileged access management technology.

solaredge-technologies.name: Zvi Lando
solaredge-technologies.bio: Became CEO of SolarEdge Technologies in 2019 following the passing of founder Guy Sella, leading the company's expansion in smart energy solutions.

solaredge-technologies.name: Guy Sella
solaredge-technologies.bio: Founded SolarEdge Technologies and served as Chairman and CEO, pioneering DC-optimized inverter systems for solar energy before his passing in 2019.

solaredge-technologies.name: Lior Handelsman
solaredge-technologies.bio: Co-founded SolarEdge Technologies and has guided the company's product strategy and marketing efforts since its inception.

solaredge-technologies.name: Ronen Faier
solaredge-technologies.bio: Long-serving Chief Financial Officer of SolarEdge Technologies, managing the company's finances through its IPO and periods of rapid growth.

outbrain.name: Yaron Galai
outbrain.bio: Co-founded Outbrain in 2006 and has served as Co-CEO, building it into one of the world's leading content discovery and native advertising platforms.

outbrain.name: David Kostman
outbrain.bio: Joined Outbrain as Co-CEO, bringing extensive global media and technology leadership experience to guide the company's growth.

outbrain.name: Ori Lahav
outbrain.bio: Co-founded Outbrain and has served as CTO, architecting the recommendation engine technology that powers content discovery.

amdocs.name: Shuky Sheffer
amdocs.bio: Leads Amdocs as President and CEO, overseeing the company's role as a leading provider of software and services to communications companies worldwide.

amdocs.name: Morris Kahn
amdocs.bio: South African-born Israeli billionaire and philanthropist who played a pivotal role in the founding and growth of Amdocs.

amdocs.name: Tamar Rapaport-Dagim
amdocs.bio: Chief Financial Officer of Amdocs, managing the financial strategy and operations of the multibillion-dollar technology services company.

israel-museum.name: Ido Bruno
israel-museum.bio: Industrial designer and curator who serves as Director of the Israel Museum in Jerusalem, overseeing one of the world's leading art and archaeology institutions.

israel-museum.name: James Snyder
israel-museum.bio: American museum professional who served as Director of the Israel Museum for over 18 years, leading a major campus renewal completed in 2010.

israel-museum.name: Teddy Kollek
israel-museum.bio: Legendary mayor of Jerusalem who founded the Israel Museum in 1965, establishing it as a world-class cultural institution housing the Dead Sea Scrolls.

wix-com.name: Avishai Abrahami
wix-com.bio: Co-founded Wix.com in 2006 and has led the company as CEO, growing it into a leading global platform for website creation.

wix-com.name: Nir Zohar
wix-com.bio: Serves as President and COO of Wix.com, overseeing the company's business operations, strategy, and user growth initiatives.

wix-com.name: Giora Kaplan
wix-com.bio: Co-founded Wix.com and serves as CTO, leading the development of the company's website building and cloud-based platform technology.

nice-systems.name: Barak Eilam
nice-systems.bio: Leads NICE Systems as CEO, transforming the company into a major cloud platform provider for customer engagement and financial crime prevention.

nice-systems.name: Steve Fredrick
nice-systems.bio: Chief Financial Officer of NICE Systems, overseeing the financial operations during its transition to cloud-based solutions.

nice-systems.name: Barry Cooper
nice-systems.bio: President of NICE's Customer Experience division, leading the company's flagship CXone cloud platform.

the-jerusalem-post.name: Yaakov Katz
the-jerusalem-post.bio: Journalist and author who serves as Editor-in-Chief of The Jerusalem Post, previously covering military and defense affairs.

the-jerusalem-post.name: Eli Azur
the-jerusalem-post.bio: Israeli businessman who acquired The Jerusalem Post and serves as its publisher.

the-jerusalem-post.name: Gershon Agron
the-jerusalem-post.bio: Founded The Palestine Post in 1932, which was renamed The Jerusalem Post in 1950.

i24news.name: Frank Melloul
i24news.bio: French-Israeli media executive who founded and leads i24NEWS as CEO, building it into an international 24-hour news channel.

i24news.name: Patrick Drahi
i24news.bio: French-Israeli billionaire telecom magnate who founded i24NEWS in 2013 through his Altice media group.

i24news.name: Lucy Aharish
i24news.bio: Prominent Arab-Israeli journalist and news presenter at i24NEWS known for her English and Hebrew broadcasting.

bar-ilan-university.name: Arie Zaban
bar-ilan-university.bio: Chemistry professor who has served as President of Bar-Ilan University since 2013, expanding the institution's research capabilities.

bar-ilan-university.name: Moshe Kaveh
bar-ilan-university.bio: Physicist who served as President of Bar-Ilan University from 1996 to 2013, significantly growing the university's academic programs.

bar-ilan-university.name: Pinchas Churgin
bar-ilan-university.bio: American rabbi and scholar who founded Bar-Ilan University in 1955 in Ramat Gan.

sentinelone.name: Tomer Weingarten
sentinelone.bio: Co-founded SentinelOne in 2013 and leads it as CEO, building the company into a leading AI-powered autonomous cybersecurity platform.

sentinelone.name: Almog Cohen
sentinelone.bio: Co-founded SentinelOne and served as CTO, developing the company's core autonomous endpoint protection technology.

sentinelone.name: Vats Srivatsan
sentinelone.bio: Serves as President and COO of SentinelOne, managing the company's business operations and global go-to-market strategy.
